main event: A civilian reported sighting an unusual circular object emitting a bright glow over Dunkirk, New York, which was observed for approximately 10 minutes before it rapidly accelerated and departed the area.
interesting points: The object was described as circular, approximately 50 to 60 feet in diameter., It emitted a bright glow., The sighting lasted for about 10 minutes., No evidence of a conventional aircraft or other explainable phenomenon was found., The object remains unidentified despite thorough investigations.
sighted object: a circular object emitting a bright glow
witness description: a credible civilian witness with no known history of false or exaggerated reporting
